attributes.action: Arrest Joseph Kony and disband the rebel group LRA (Lord Resistance Army)
attributes.additional_details:
•	We ask that our government matches the military commitment of America in bringing Joseph Kony and the LRA to Justice.
•	We ask that our government raise the issue of the LRA with the United Nations, and European Union.
•	We ask that our government provides the means to ensure relief agencies are able to help those affected.
•	We ask that our government acts in partnership with relevant countries to limit the LRA’s movement.
•	We ask that our government acts in partnership with other governments and regional bodies to actively search for the LRA.
•	We ask that our government help aid the recovery of people and regions who have been affected by the LRA.
•	We ask that our government encourages and supports the international effort to arrest Joseph Kony
